info.name: Amori People API
info.description: People/Relationships management endpoints for Amori API. Manage your relationships, track birthdays, anniversaries, and get comprehensive profiles.

item.name: People

query.description: Filter by relation type: partner, spouse, parent, child, sibling, friend, colleague, mentor, other

request.description:
Get all relationships for the authenticated user.

**Optional Query Parameters:**
- `relation_type` - Filter by relationship type

**Relation Types:**
- partner
- spouse
- parent
- child
- sibling
- friend
- colleague
- mentor
- other

**Returns:**
- Array of people sorted by name

query.description: Number of days to look ahead (1-365, default: 30)

request.description:
Get all upcoming events in a single optimized call.

**Query Parameters:**
- `days` - Number of days to look ahead (1-365, default: 30)

**Returns:**
- `birthdays` - People with upcoming birthdays (with daysUntil)
- `anniversaries` - People with upcoming anniversaries (with daysUntil, years)
- `upcomingMemories` - Memory anniversaries coming up (e.g., "1 year since first date")
- `upcomingPlans` - Scheduled events within the date range

**Optimized:**
Single database query using PostgreSQL JSON aggregation for maximum performance.

Get full profile of a person including all associated data.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` - Person UUID

**Returns:**
- `person` - Basic person information
- `memories` - All memories associated with this person
- `upcomingPlans` - Future incomplete plans for this person
- `wishlist` - Gift ideas for this person
- `daysUntilBirthday` - Days until their next birthday (null if no birthday set)
- `daysUntilAnniversary` - Object with days and years until next anniversary

**Optimized:**
Single database query using PostgreSQL JSON aggregation.

Add a new relationship/person.

**Required Fields:**
- `name` - Person's name (min 1 character)
- `relation_type` - Type of relationship

**Optional Fields:**
- `birthday` - Date string (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `anniversary` - Date string (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `notes` - Additional notes
- `avatar_url` - URL to avatar image
- `phone` - Phone number
- `email` - Email address

**Relation Types:**
- partner, spouse, parent, child, sibling, friend, colleague, mentor, other

**Returns:**
- Created person object with generated ID

Update an existing person/relationship.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` - Person UUID

**Optional Fields (all fields are optional):**
- `name` - Person's name
- `relation_type` - Type of relationship
- `birthday` - Date string (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `anniversary` - Date string (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `notes` - Additional notes
- `avatar_url` - URL to avatar image
- `phone` - Phone number
- `email` - Email address

**Returns:**
- Updated person object

**Errors:**
- 404 if person not found or doesn't belong to user

Delete a person and ALL associated data.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` - Person UUID

**Cascade Deletes:**
- All memories associated with this person
- All planner events for this person
- All wishlist items for this person
- The person record itself

**⚠️ Warning:**
This action is irreversible. All associated data will be permanently deleted.

**Optimized:**
Single database query using PostgreSQL CTEs for atomic deletion.

**Returns:**
- 204 No Content on success
- 404 if person not found

item.description: Manage your relationships and people. All endpoints require authentication.
